meanings.definition: A small device used for holding sheets of paper together.
meanings.sent1: I found a paperclip on my desk to hold my papers together.
meanings.sent2: She used a paperclip to keep her homework organized.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel tried to use a paperclip as a tiny sword.
meanings.sent4: Her smile was as bright as a shiny paperclip in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The paperclip's silver color gleamed like a tiny star in the dark drawer.

meanings.definition: To fasten or attach with a paperclip.
meanings.sent1: He decided to paperclip the documents together for safekeeping.
meanings.sent2: She will paperclip the notes to the report before submitting it.
meanings.sent3: The magician tried to paperclip the cards together for his trick.
meanings.sent4: His words papercliped my heart, holding it tightly in place.
meanings.sent5: The memories papercliped in her mind, never to be forgotten.
